config_definition.header: These variables SHOULD NOT be changed once the model has been built. urrently, these variables are not cached. Note1: users SHOULD NOT modify BUILD_COMPETE below this is done automatically by the scripts.

entry.desc: atmosphere grid - DO NOT EDIT (for experts only)
Model grid - DO NOT EDIT (for experts only)
ice grid (must equal ocn grid) - DO NOT EDIT (for experts only)
number of ice thickness categories - DO NOT EDIT (set by CICE configure)
land grid - DO NOT EDIT (for experts only)
ocn grid - DO NOT EDIT (for experts only)

mpi library (must match one of the supported libraries) - ignored once Macros has been created Set in /glade/p/work/erik/clm_gswp3drflds/cime/machines/config_machines.xml for each supported machine. Must be explicitly set in env_build.xml for userdefined machine.

Supported mpi libraries for target machine - set in config_machines.xml - (DO NOT EDIT) Set in /glade/p/work/erik/clm_gswp3drflds/cime/machines/config_machines.xml for each supported machine. Must be explicitly set in env_build.xml for userdefined machine.
Operating system - DO NOT EDIT UNLESS for userdefined machine - ignored once Macros has been created.
